sources.title: Sister to Judas
sources.description: Title: Sister to Judas Summary: A young writer saves a desperate young woman from committing suicide. They eventually fall in love and marry, but their marriage faces some serious roadblocks. Directed by: E. Mason Hopper Actors: Production Company: Ralph M. Like Productions Release Date: 26 December 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young writer saves a desperate young woman from committing suicide. They eventually fall in love and marry, but their marriage faces some serious roadblocks.

metadata.Plot: A young writer saves a desperate young woman from committing suicide. They eventually fall in love and marry, but their marriage faces some serious roadblocks.
metadata.Writer: John T. Neville, Watkins E. Wright
metadata.Actors: Claire Windsor, Holmes Herbert, John Harron
